name: Huntercat vs Demons
description:
EDIT1: Background bug fixed.

Platform: Windows.

A survival/Action Tower-Defense game by Paulo Matos.

In the year of 2077, a nice Retro Cafeteria called "The Space b4 Space" is known to host authentic food. Nowadays all the "regular food" is made to be entirely absorbed by your body, so no nutrient is wasted. That means the body no longer needs to ... use the toilet to do the number 2. But, however, in "The Space b4 Space" is served OLD SCHOOL RETRO food. Therefore, even with the extinction of toilets, THE LAST REMAINING TOILET OF THE ENTIRE UNIVERSE is held in this caffeteria. Nothing like taking a good shit to make you feel alive again. But there is a problem! The place is under attack. By the only race that's known for breaking toilets after taking a dump. Yes, Jim. IT'S DEMONS. Let us call, then, the only warriors of the entire universe that are capable of seeing demons and fight them. The Cats. Our hope for the Last Remaining Toilet is in the hands of a HUNTERCAT named Bob, the best of it's kind. Save us, Bob. The fate of the toilet rests in your... paws.

#IWantToCreate

I expected to deliver much more on this game, but I had one man down, so all the art had to be done by me. Expect future updates and polishing.
